pr_title: CP recent bug-fixes from master to 2.3

timeline.message:
Sanitize string before removing comments from it. (#8792)

Fixes #8713

(cherry picked from commit 1311500c542d72d137d7cc5085efddb131a776b3)

Don't remove children immediately: make checks and then remove (#8798)

Fixes #4662

(cherry picked from commit 4156e49fd63130fc11e3f6ec4718e9ac49700aaf)
Extend javadocs for Text and clarify not-supported API (#8799)

Avoid findIndex JS Array function. (#8788)

* Avoid findIndex JS Array function.

Fixes #8711

* Fix indentation

(cherry picked from commit d8e927449fa19080e4c76713f890bd42d15fa07c)

Overload EmailValidator to accept an empty value (#8804)

* Overload EmailValidator to accept an empty value

Fixes #7899

* Mention overloaded CTOR and its behavior in the existing CTOR

(cherry picked from commit b68f69ca5c01c1264e438c6b02e479e539d0fde0)

timeline.bodyText: Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "" 3 times.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot

timeline.bodyText: Remove this method to simply inherit it.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot

timeline.message:
Make a workaround for Spring boot run as jar (#8808)

* Make a workaround for Spring boot run as jar

Fixes #8705

* Add a unit test for implemented workaround.

* Add forgotten resource

* Improve variable name and add comments

(cherry picked from commit 6f1d6a5d9fdf23bae359a8cc024536b91e7182c8)

Improve log message for skipping (p)pnpm install (#8819)

Fixes #8614

Fix setClassName to work as specified in javadoc (#8842)

Fixes #8840

Add transmission semantic for URI attribute values (#8826)

* Add transmission semantic for URI attribute values

Fixes #8813

* Add some comments, correct javadocs

* Fix GWT tests

* Use one magic method instead of another

* Check the type of JsonValue before read it

(cherry picked from commit 80e31943fce1831d4c85eef6879c9c4a67247770)
